name: Shepherd's Tale (Games by Fat cat, Yoris)
name_original: Shepherd's Tale (Games by Fat cat, Yoris)
description:
A cute game about collecting missing sheep. This is not a finished game, see it as a demo! We are aware that it is filled with bugs and the combat is in need of balancing, we simply didn't have time to playtest it. I actually hadn't even played through it once at the time of submitting o_o

How to combat: Open the menu, select your weapon, move the red box onto an enemy, and confirm. Bows have longer range but less accuracy. I know the combat is quite wonky in this state but in the future it will be more strategy-based!

There are 9 sheep in total that you have to find. Return them all to the fence area (top left corner of the map) to beat the game!

Still missing one of the sheep? Here is an image showing their locations: https://imgur.com/a/L76HDHf
